summary: Completed testing of Jan-Seva government scheme eligibility platform. Backend APIs are mostly functional (88.9% success rate), but found critical session management issue preventing quiz completion.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthorized access
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - both status codes indicate unauthorized access appropriately

critical_bugs.issue: Users get logged out during quiz completion, redirected to login page
critical_bugs.impact: Prevents core functionality - users cannot complete eligibility quiz

ui_bugs.issue: Some quiz option selectors have inconsistent data-testid patterns

passed_tests: Frontend initial quiz questions (age, gender, state, area)

success_percentage.frontend: 60% - Major authentication issue blocks core functionality

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix session/JWT token management issue causing users to be logged out during quiz. This prevents the core quiz-to-results flow from working. Also review frontend authentication persistence and token refresh logic.
